Title: Uncle Hyacynth
Writer: Andrés Laszlo (story), Andrés Laszlo (screenplay), José Santugini (screenplay), Max Korner (screenplay), Gian Luigi Rondi (screenplay), Ladislao Vajda (screenplay)
Actors: Pablito Calvo, Antonio Vico, José Marco Davó, Juan Calvo
Plot: Jacinto, a retired bullfighter who lives miserably with his nephew Pepote, receives a letter in which he is informed that, according to an old agreement, he must participate in a mock ...
